Package org.resthub.identity.dao

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbstractPermissionsOwnerDao
    Dao for generic operations on AbstractPermissionsOwner entities.
    PermissionsOwnerDao<T extends AbstractPermissionsOwner>
    This is the interface defining a PermissionsOwnerDao It is based on a GenericResourceDao of type AbstractPermissionsOwner
    RoleDao  
    SearchDao
    Special DAO that performs search queries on users, groups and roles
    UserDao  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPermissionsOwnerDaoImpl
    Dao for generic operations on AbstractPermissionsOwner entities.
    HibernateSearchDao
    Implementation of the search DAO with HibernateSearch
    JpaGroupDao
    The JpaGroupDao is based on both GenericJpaResourceDao and GroupDao
    It is a bean whose name is "groupDao"
    JpaUserDao
    The JpaUserDao class is based on both GenericJpaResourceDao and UserDao
    It is a bean whose name is userDao
    RoleDaoImpl
